Class preciseMovement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.preciseMovement

  • class preciseMovement
extends java.lang.Object
    library to use math for precise movement, primarily for autonomous

      • move

        public void move(double forward,
                 double right,
                 double spin,
                 double timeout,
                 robotconfig robot)
        function takes measurements in mm to move the robot
        Parameters:
        forward - amount to move forward in mm
        right - amount to move right in mm
        spin - amount to spin degrees clockwise
        timeout - time to take doing movement
        robot - just make it robot, for getting the configuration

      • move

        function takes measurements in mm to move the robot
        Parameters:
        forward - amount to move forward in mm
        right - amount to move right in mm
        spin - amount to spin degrees clockwise
        timeout - time to take doing movement
        robot - just make it robot, for getting the configuration
        telemetry - just leave it as telemetry to allow program to write telemetry
